text:
Belt Parkway, south from 20th Avenue, showing the highway under construction on hydraulic fill. The fill was taken from Gravesend Bay and part of the Bay filled in. In the left background is the Semken Coal pockets, at Bay 32nd Street.

May 28, 1939
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr

Belt Parkway, south from 20th Avenue, showing the highway under construction on hydraulic fill. The fill was taken from Gravesend Bay and part of the Bay filled in. In the left background is the Semken Coal pockets, at Bay 32nd Street.

May 28, 1939
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr

Belt Parkway, north from 20th Avenue, on the shore of Gravesend Bay, showing the fill--which was taken out from the bay by sandsucker pipes--upon which the new highway will be constructed. In the background of view 2 is the area lying east of Cropsey Avenue, which was formerly near the bay's shore.

May 28, 1939
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr

Belt Parkway, north from 20th Avenue, on the shore of Gravesend Bay, showing the fill--which was taken out from the bay by sandsucker pipes--upon which the new highway will be constructed. In the background of view 2 is the area lying east of Cropsey Avenue, which was formerly near the bay's shore.

May 28, 1939
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr
